languages.text: Wielder gains +1 Deflection and their Shotgun reloads are free.

languages.text: The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} a shotgun costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
